title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button moves down from its original position and is no longer on the same line as the label.
EB: The close button should stay on the same line as the label regardless of the size of the view. Users expect the close button to be located in the far-right corner.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the view. 2. Resize the view to make it smaller. 3. Observe the position of the close button in relation to the label.
